name: Carnival Slime
description: It’s 1853 in New York City, After his Jenny Lind concert series, American Showman P.T Barnum is looking for his next big attraction. He comes by a ‘slime’ in a small town in Iowa and hires it on the spot as his next hit attraction. Now with the eyes of the world upon him, Barnum is all set to reveal his newest headliner, a real life Slime.
